info.title: Accord Protocol
info.description: API for document generation and agreement automation

description: Bytes and mime type for a blob of data, such as images, files, etc.

sharedModel.description: The identifier of an instance of org.accordproject.protocol@1.0.0.SharedModel

description: The concept declaration associated with a template

uri.description: The instance identifier for this type

id.description: The instance identifier for this type

/sharedmodels.summary: Path used to manage the list of sharedmodels.
/sharedmodels.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `sharedmodel` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `sharedmodel` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `sharedmodel` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `sharedmodel`.

/sharedmodels/{uri}.summary: Path used to manage a single sharedmodel.
/sharedmodels/{uri}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of a `sharedmodel`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `sharedmodel`.

/templates.summary: Path used to manage the list of templates.
/templates.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `template` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `template` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `template` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `template`.

/templates/{uri}.summary: Path used to manage a single template.
/templates/{uri}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of a `template`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `template`.

/agreements.summary: Path used to manage the list of agreements.
/agreements.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `agreement` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `agreement` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `agreement` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `agreement`.

/agreements/{uri}.summary: Path used to manage a single agreement.
/agreements/{uri}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of a `agreement`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `agreement`.

/agreements/{agreementId}/convert/html.summary: Path used to convert an agreeement to HTML format.
/agreements/{agreementId}/convert/html.description: The REST endpoint/path used convert or render an `agreement` to HTML format.

/agreements/{agreementId}/trigger.summary: Path used to trigger an agreeement.
/agreements/{agreementId}/trigger.description: The REST endpoint/path used trigger an `agreement`.

requestBody.description: Incoming data — a JSON serialized Concerto type

200.description: Successful response - returns the result of calling a function.

post.description: Sends data to an existing agreement.

/capabilities.summary: Path used to retrieve server capabilities.
/capabilities.description: The REST endpoint used to understand the capabiities of the server.

200.description: Successful response - returns `capabilities` for the server.

get.description: Retrieve the supported features of the server.
